com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

Class SpenControlLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine.SpenControlBase
        • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine.SpenControlLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback

    public class SpenControlLine
extends SpenControlBase
    The control class that manages line object. ControlLine is a sub class of ControlBase. It is a control class for managing line object which is been selected.

    Since:
    4.0.0
